response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 by us, reflecting its unique features and the expertise poured into its creation. Given its extraordinary value and capabilities, we believe it could significantly benefit your endeavors. We kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product at an exclusive offer price of $10,500. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will not only secure a remarkable asset but also potentially unlock new opportunities. We look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your projects or personal pursuits. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 10500}
